name: QuickLDR
author: HJfod
description: Simple mod loader

name: MinHook
description: Most mods require this file to work, place it in the same place where your GD executable is located.

name: BetterEdit
author: HJfod
description: Adds a ton of useful features to the editor.

name: GDShare
author: HJfod
description: Makes transferring levels effortlessly easy via files, and supports NONG songs too

name: Song Search
author: matcool
description: Adds a search bar to the saved songs menu.

name: Scroll Any Input
author: HJfod
description: Allows you to scroll on any numerical input to increase/decrease it.

name: GD Guidelines
author: matcool
description: A Geometry Dash tool that adds guidelines to your last created level based on song BPM.

name: Abbreviated Labels
author: iAndy
description: Shortens the number amount of downloads and likes on the level menus.

name: Remove Endscreen
author: iAndy
description: Removes the endscreen when finishing a level.

name: TextureLDR
author: poweredbypie
description: Mod that allows easy switching between texture packs.

name: Icon Kit Saver
author: HJfod
description: Allows you to save/load icon kits

name: Volume Control
author: HJfod
description: Allows you to alt + scroll to change the volume level

name: BetterInfo
author: Cvolton
description: Adds a lot of extra info to the game

name: Sai Mod Pack
author: Sai
description: Adds the ability to add more icons, custom player particles, 2.2 color select and custom menu colors!

name: Run Info
author: matcool
description: Displays your run information while in practice mode/with a startpos.

name: Level Info Settings
author: Figment
description: Displays the settings icon from the main menu in the level menus.

name: Every Key Jump
author: matcool
description: Allows you to use any key to jump. (Incompatible with some mods)

name: Scene Switcher
author: HJfod
description: Lets you switch between scenes quickly by holding Caps Lock

name: Custom Splash Screen Messages
description: Allows you to have custom splash screen messages

name: ScreenSelector
author: cgytrus
description: Adds the ability to put GD on a different monitor and adds borderless fullscreen

name: FadeMusicOnDeath
author: cgytrus
description: Makes the music slow down when you crash, instead of a full stop.

name: Infinite Mode
description: Play your way through a series of levels that get aggressively harder

name: Crash Logger
author: matcool
description: Generates a crash log file when the game crashes.

name: NONG Song Downloader
author: paroxysms
description: Makes downloading NONG songs easy and efficient

name: UI Recolor
author: Ikszyon
description: Lets you customize many of GD's hard-coded colors

name: MegaHack Recolor
author: Ikszyon
description:
Lets you customise the default purple colour in MegaHack v7's GUI
Needs to be loaded with quickldr!

name: FutureDash
author: MikaKC
description: Clickable badge icons and other features.

name: Bonk
author: cgytrus
description: Plays a bonk sound whenever you bonk your head against a solid object

name: Crystal Client
author: ninXout
description: The first MacOS mod menu ever (for Geode) with 80+ mods, a WIP bot coming soon.

name: SoundEffects
author: iAndy
description: A mod that adds sound effects to gameplay events.

name: Timestamp Fix
author: matcool
description: Fixes uploaded and updated always being "NA Ago" on the level info popup

name: Alt Tab Fix
author: HJfod
description: Fixes the game thinking that you are still holding alt when you initially alt-tab into the game

name: Invisible Dual Bugfix
author: HJfod
description: Fixes the other icon being invisible while in a dual

name: SmoothParticles
author: cgytrus
description: Makes the game feel a bit smoother by interpolating particle spawn positions between frames

name: GeometryCache
author: cgytrus
description: Improves loading performance by using QOI image compression instead of PNG

name: GDAntiAliasing
author: IliasHDZ
description: Eliminates jaggies that appear in sharp objects in GD

name: "Low" Capacity Fix
author: Cvolton
description: Fixes an issue with an optimization fix that RobTop messed up during the development.

name: Clipboard Fix
author: adaf
description: Fixes not being able to copy the level ID under level comments

name: Checkpoint Fix
author: Figment
description: Fixes momentum with checkpoints, made extremely accurate in the MH Beta

name: Orb Fix
author: matcool
description: Fixes orbs not being pressed in practice mode, only useful for zBot as most bots have it included
